text: was a Japanese businessman. He was chairman of Sumitomo Chemical"Hiromasa Yonekura: Executive Profile & Biography", Bloomberg, Retrieved on February 4, 2011 and was also the chairman of the Japan Business Federation (Nippon Keidanren).Nippon Keidanren, "Officers of Nippon Keidanren" , Retrieved February 4, 2011 He remained in this position until 2009, when he became chairman of the board.Petro Rabigh, "Hiromasa Yonekura" Retrieved on 4 February 2011 He was born in Kobe, Japan. Yonekura died on November 16, 2018 in Tokyo at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Japanese businesspeople
title: Hiromasa Yonekura
